sports.name: Football
sports.description: Football is a team sport played with a spherical ball between two teams of eleven players.

sports.name: Basketball
sports.description: Basketball is a team sport played with a ball between two teams of five players.

sports.name: Tennis
sports.description: Tennis is a racket sport played individually against a single opponent or between two teams of two players each.

sports.name: Swimming
sports.description: Swimming is an individual or team sport that involves using arms and legs to move the body through water.

sports.name: Rowing
sports.description: Rowing is a sport in which boats are propelled through water by the motion of oars.

sports.name: Sailing
sports.description: Sailing is the sport of using wind to power sails and propel boats through water.

sports.name: Boxing
sports.description: Boxing is a combat sport in which two people wearing protective gloves throw punches at each other for a predetermined set of time in a boxing ring.

sports.name: Wrestling
sports.description: Wrestling is a combat sport that involves grappling techniques such as clinch fighting, throws and takedowns, joint locks, pins and other grappling holds.

sports.name: Muay Thai
sports.description: Muay Thai is a combat sport that originated in Thailand and involves striking techniques such as punches, kicks, knee strikes, and elbow strikes.
